name: isponsorblocktv
description: iSponsorBlockTV integrates the SponsorBlock database with Jellyfin or other video front ends to automatically skip sponsored segments. It runs alongside your media stack and helps provide ad free viewing of YouTube content on TV interfaces.

features.title: Sponsor Skipping
features.description: Automatically skip sponsored segments in YouTube videos

features.title: Sponsorblock Integration
features.description: Uses crowdsourced SponsorBlock database for segment detection

features.title: Tv Interface
features.description: Works with YouTube on smart TVs and streaming devices

features.title: Jellyfin Support
features.description: Integrates with Jellyfin for YouTube content playback

features.title: Automatic Detection
features.description: Identifies and skips sponsors, intros, outros, and other segments

features.title: Seamless Experience
features.description: Skips happen automatically without user interaction

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Runs alongside your existing media server infrastructure

features.title: Ad
features.description: Enjoy YouTube content without interruptions on large screens
